lenders.name: Gavin
lenders.loan_because: Like many others on Kiva, I have more than I need and want to share with others. I know that Kiva field partners require heavy interest from borrowers, however I hope that the loans help people to achieve greater wealth. In turn, I hope this wealth reduces the urge to take too much from the environment. In almost every case, a well preserved environment is worth more money to people who live there than a damaged environment.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a global social media manager at ABB. I've also been an English teacher in South Korea, a journalist, a blogger and an editor. Join me on Twitter https://twitter.com/#!/gavinhudson and say hi from Kiva! :)

When I am just ashes in a County Clare breeze, I hope that my photographs will serve as a gentle reminder of the places I visited and the friendly faces I knew along the way.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: The idea of helping out small businesses in other countries is baller to me.

lenders.name: Ernest & Tanya

He was the most spirit-filled and generous person I have ever had the privilege of knowing.  To honor his memory, I have added to the total funds and have continued to lend to benefit other widows and many people in need around the world. 51 loans to date on behalf of my dearly loved husband.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
Loan proceeds will go towards the cost of building a one-of-a-kind website I have purchased, (www.seattleISmusic.com). I want to create a new and convenient way for you to discover, experience and aquuire great music. It is going to be a new way for people to be able to discover and find music here in Seattle. A small portion of loan will be used towards marketing costs to help build a powerful new brand.

I have 7 years experience in the radio industry working within marketing/promotions for radio stations all over the US. I would like to take my experience and vision and make it a reality. I have founded my company on 2 personal qualities, PASSION and PERSEVERANCE. If you feel passionate about a particular business and have the fortitude to break down the barriers and redirect as needed, you can indeed do GREAT things!

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: all people need is an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Developing software to help manage trucking and shipping.

lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.occupational_info: I work with young children from 6wks to 5 years.  I am an a early education teacher.

lenders.name: McKinsey Family
lenders.loan_because: We would want a way to receive a loan if we needed it, and the Bible teaches us to love our neighbors like ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
The mother teaches people who are blind.
The father maintains the home.
The oldest son works in a factory.
Two sons and two daughters are in school.

lenders.occupational_info: Culinary cook for work, I also like to write.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: If I don't set the right example for my daughter, how will the world ever change

lenders.name: scott@joy
lenders.loan_because:
Exodus 22:25 (New International Version)
 25 "If you lend money to one of my people among you who is needy, do not be like a moneylender; charge him no interest.

Deuteronomy 23:19
Do not charge your brother interest, whether on money or food or anything else that may earn interest.

Leviticus 25:35-37 (New International Version)
 35 " 'If one of your countrymen becomes poor and is unable to support himself among you, help him as you would an alien or a temporary resident, so he can continue to live among you. 36 Do not take interest of any kind [a] from him, but fear your God, so that your countryman may continue to live among you. 37 You must not lend him money at interest or sell him food at a profit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help bring people into the presence of God through music.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: it feels good and life has been pretty good to me lately.

lenders.occupational_info: We are Mr. Wallach's 3rd grade class in Tucson, Arizona. We are always looking for ways that we can have a positive impact on other people...especially those in need.

lenders.loan_because: It can really make a difference.  Also, reading Banker to the Poor by Muhammad Yunus was inspiring.

lenders.name: Kyung
lenders.loan_because:
When I was young there was a great storm, and thousands of starfish were washed up on the beach. The next morning I walked along the beach and I saw a little girl running up and down the beach, frantically throwing the starfish back into the water. 
I asked her what she was doing and she replied "If I don't throw these starfish back into the water the sun will burn & dry them out and they will die.
I responded: "What's the use? You'll never be able to save them all. It won't make any difference." 
She held up a starfish and said: "it makes a difference to this one."

lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful concept & it feels great to be able to help.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to give back.

Sometimes the hazards involve contamination in the soil and groundwater and I have to figure out how to clean up the soil and groundwater so that they are safe for people to drink, touch, eat or breath.

lenders.loan_because: I KNOW WHAT IT IS LIKE TO BE IN NEED AND WISH SOMEONE WAS THEIR TO HELP, IT IS GREAT FEELING TO BE ABLE TO HELP THOSE  IN NEED!!
lenders.occupational_info:
ASF CONTRACTING INC. is proud to offer a wide range of real estate development services. Our team of experts has a wide range of experience and can tailor our services to meet your exact needs.

ASF CONTRACTING INC. IS A FULL SERVICE, LICENCED AND INSURED BUILDING CORP. SERVICING NASSAU, SUFFOLK, AND 5 BOROS.
SPECIALIZING IN:

- DEMOLITION: RESIDENTIAL & COMMERCIAL PROPERTIES

- EXCAVATION AND FOUNDATIONS
    
 - DRYWELLS SUPPLIED AND INSTALLED   
     
- LAND CLEARING AND GRADING / DRAINAGE / FULL SITE ASSESSMENT                
  SITE PREPARATION
     
- PROPERTY MGMT.

- ALL PHASES OF CONCRETE WORK

- ALL PHASES OF MASONRY WORK INCLUDING

- INTERLOCKING PAVERS / CULTURED STONE / BRICK AND BLOCK WORK
  CELLAR ENTRANCES / DRIVEWAYS / SIDEWALKS / WALKWAYS /
  STOOPS AND PATIOS /  VIOLATIONS REMOVED

- 10-30YD CONTAINER SERVICE / MACHINE HIRE

- MATERIALS DELIVERED / RCA / TOPSOIL / SAND / ALL TYPES OF
   STONE AND GRAVEL

- GENERAL CONSTRUCTION / REMODELING / EXTENSIONS / DORMERS 

- NEW HOMES / CUSTOM HOMES

- REAL ESTATE DEVELOPMENT /  REAL ESTATE SERVICES AND SALES

- EXPEDITING SERVICES

lenders.name: Ryan Provost, Inc.
lenders.loan_because: As a small business, we recognize the risks and financial needs associated with opening and maintaining a small business.  Our goal is to foster that entrepreneurial spirit in order to grow a new business that will benefit the local community.  Since finding Kiva.org, we have committed to originating a new micro-loan for each contract we complete.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide website and design  services that enable our customers to better leverage their overall brand.

lenders.name: Lisha
lenders.loan_because: I care about people and want to help them as much as I possibly can;  Kiva allows me to reach out to many people that otherwise I might not be able to reach.  It is with love and hope in my heart that I lend: love for people who are too often ignored and hope that the most that these people wish for is the least that they receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I tutor one on one via the computer. It is a fantastic job! I love helping students understand their subject matter. The subjects I tutor include all levels of English & Essay Writing and grades 4-7 in Math and Math en español. Additionally, I help adults write resumés, study for their GED, and study for their U.S. Citizenship test. I am truly blessed.
